text: Avdotyino () is a rural locality (a village) in Razdolyevskoye Rural Settlement of Kolchuginsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 3 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The village is located 14 km west from Razdolye and 6 km south-west from Kolchugino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vladimir Oblast
title: Avdotyino, Kolchuginsky District, Vladimir Oblast
